definitions.definition: A person who hoards money rather than spending it; one who is cheap or extremely parsimonious .
examples: Scrooge was a typical miser : spending nothing he could save, nor enjoying his wealth.

definitions.definition: A person who is wretched or despicable ; a wretch .
A kind of earth auger , typically large- bored and often hand-operated.

main_definition: ( derogatory ) A person who hoards money rather than spending it; one who is cheap or extremely parsimonious . [late 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A person who is wretched or despicable ; a wretch .
A kind of earth auger , typically large- bored and often hand-operated.
